tools module¶

mavis.tools.SUPPORTED_TOOL = MavisNamespace(BREAKDANCER='breakdancer', CHIMERASCAN='chimerascan', DEFUSE='defuse', DELLY='delly', MANTA='manta', MAVIS='mavis', PINDEL='pindel', TA='transabyss', VCF='vcf', _defns={}, _types={'MANTA': <class 'str'>, 'DELLY': <class 'str'>, 'TA': <class 'str'>, 'PINDEL': <class 'str'>, 'CHIMERASCAN': <class 'str'>, 'MAVIS': <class 'str'>, 'DEFUSE': <class 'str'>, 'BREAKDANCER': <class 'str'>, 'VCF': <class 'str'>})¶

Supported Tools used to call SVs and then used as input into MAVIS

  • chimerascan [Iyer-2011]
  • defuse [McPherson-2011]
  • delly [Rausch-2012]
  • manta [Chen-2016]
  • pindel [Ye-2009]
  • transabyss [Robertson-2010]
mavis.tools.convert_tool_output(input_file, file_type='mavis', stranded=False, log=<function devnull>, collapse=True, assume_no_untemplated=True)[source]¶

Reads output from a given SV caller and converts to a set of MAVIS breakpoint pairs. Also collapses duplicates
